alert.note: Alert for Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 12 at 3:11AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Otsego, southeastern Broome, Delaware, southeastern Chenango, northwestern Sullivan, eastern Susquehanna and northern Wayne Counties through 415 AM EST... At 310 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Morris to near Sanford to near Lanesboro to near Lenoxville. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oneonta, Sidney, Damascus, Jackson, Walton, Delhi, Callicoon, Davenport, Clifford and Sanford. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 81 and 93. Interstate 88 between 7 and 19. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 206 and 219. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
